00012 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00013 
00014 // stxxl::mutex is not needed since boost:mutex exists
00015  #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00016 
00017 #else
00018 
00019  #include "stxxl/bits/common/utils.h"
00020 
00021  #include <pthread.h>
00022 
00023 
00024 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00025 
00026 class mutex
00027 {
00028     pthread_mutex_t _mutex;
00029 public:
00030 
00031     mutex ()
00032     {
00033         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_init (&_mutex, NULL), resource_error);
00034     };
00035 
00036     ~mutex ()
00037     {
00038         int res = pthread_mutex_trylock (&_mutex);
00039 
00040         if (res == 0 || res == EBUSY) {
00041             stxxl_nassert(pthread_mutex_unlock(&_mutex), resource_error);
00042         } else
00043             stxxl_function_error(resource_error);
00044 
00045         stxxl_nassert(pthread_mutex_destroy(&_mutex), resource_error);
00046     };
00047     void lock ()
00048     {
00049         stxxl_nassert(pthread_mutex_lock (&_mutex), resource_error);
00050     }
00051     void unlock ()
00052     {
00053         stxxl_nassert(pthread_mutex_unlock (&_mutex), resource_error);
00054     }
00055 };
00056 
00057 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00058 
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #endif
